thread.title: Mobile internet blocked in Rajkot as Hardik Patel warns of protest at ODI venue
thread.title_full: Mobile internet blocked in Rajkot as Hardik Patel warns of protest at ODI venue - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Mobile internet blocked in Rajkot as Hardik Patel warns of protest at ODI venue
text: The Rajkot administration tonight banned mobile internet services in the district, ahead of the India-South Africa cricket ODI to be played tomorrow, after Patel quota stir leader Hardik Patel threatened to stage a protest at the cricket stadium during the match. Â»
